reviews.review_content:
I think James is a pretty solid TA but would want to have him as a TA for a Southeast Asian religion class, which is his specialty.  He has the qualities of a really good TA - he's approachable, he's attentive in lecture (which makes it easy for us to go over course material in recitation rather than just hearing his point on everything) and he helped us a lot with our papers.  However, he didn't know much more about Islam than the rest of us, which could be frustrating at times.  Nonetheless, I would be happy if I had him for another class.
Workload:
Islam course - 4 8 page papers, midterm, final, a lot of reading
